ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record where the lab result fell with respect to the reference range (e.g. HIGH, LOW, ABNORMAL).

ReferenceDocuments.name: LBNRIND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Reference Ranges may be defined by LBORNRLO and LBORNRHI or other objective criteria. Typically for local processing "Reference Range Indicator" may be derived or determined programmatically and is not collected on the CRF. Should not be used to indicate clinical significance.
